name: stream-report-videos
title: Export a csv report on all Microsoft Stream videos
shortDescription: This script export a report on all Microsoft Stream videos (complete list and all videos not yet migrated)
longDescription: Microsoft Stream (Classic) will be retired soon , therefore we need to gather a list of all videos info for a mid-term migration. This script allow us to export a list with all videos detailed in our tenant

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Export a csv report on all Microsoft Stream videos
